instruction_adherence.name: Instruction Adherence
instruction_adherence.description: A trigger action (P1) must eventually be followed by an expected outcome (P2) at some point in the future. This is for cause-and-effect relationships where the timing is not immediate.
instruction_adherence.extended_example: For multiple outcomes (P2, P3) after a trigger (P1): ALWAYS (P1 IMPLIES (EVENTUALLY(P2) AND EVENTUALLY(P3)))

operational_restriction.name: Operational Restriction
operational_restriction.description: A sensitive action (P2) is forbidden until a required preparatory check or condition (P1) has occurred at some point in the past.
operational_restriction.extended_example: For multiple preconditions (P1, P_pre) before an action (P2): (NOT ((NOT P1) UNTIL P2)) AND (NOT ((NOT P_pre) UNTIL P2))
